# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this item holds a significant importance to me, reflecting a $12,000 personal valuation. Considering both its intrinsic worth and your potential appreciation, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $11,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value, while still allowing me to recoup a considerable portion of its cost to me. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your valuation. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of facilitating this transaction with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
